text: læa h̄ā kxạllxḥˌ ca thrng h̄ı̂ thukk̄h̒ p̣hạy pras̄b kæ̀ cêā læ̂w k̆ mị̀mī p̄hū̂ dı pldpelụ̄̂xng mạn dị̂ nxkcāk phraxngkh̒ læa h̄āk phraxngkh̒ thrng prārt̄hnā khwām dī kæ̀ cêā læ̂w k̆ ca mị̀mī p̄hū̂ dı kīdkạn khwām pordprān k̄hxng phraxngkh̒ dị̂ phraxngkh̒ ca thrng h̄ı̂ pras̄b kæ̀ p̄hū̂ thī̀ phraxngkh̒ thrng pras̄ngkh̒ cāk pwng b̀āw k̄hxng phraxngkh̒ læa phraxngkh̒ ca pĕn p̄hū̂thrng xp̣hạythos̄ʹ p̄hū̂thrng mettā s̄emx
